resources.string: Tour Guide
A great place to visit, south of Cairo but easy to do when also visiting Saqqara and Memphis.
Cairo, Egypt
Camels, pyramids, desert - coming here was an amazing experience that cannot be adequately described.

As part of our Cairo tour, we visited these two cities - Memphis and Sakkara.
Cairo 11655, Egypt
The oldest university in the world is built around this ancient mosque, which has been the center of Islamic scholarship since 975 AD.

This mosque, madrasa and tomb, is one of the most important sites of Cairo.

This is considered one of Egypt\'s largest and oldest mosques.

Been here many times, the pizza is excellent, with a thin crust and many options for toppings are offered.

Only the finest ingredients have been hand selected for an authentic taste of Italy at Pane Vino

Great dinner and excellent service and a different taste and the most beautiful pasta dish with Truffle Mushroom

One of the best places ever, the food quality is perfect, the service is more than perfect.

Another JW treat. I have to commend the whole experience. The setting, the vibe, the knowledgeable Mohammad and of course

Iti s a new, modern hotel, located right in the center of the city, close to the Egyptian Museum. The room service did a wonderful job
